content:
# I have successfully gathered 20 stone, along with the previously collected 20 coal and 20 iron ore. 
# Now I can proceed to craft a Stone Furnace since I have the required materials.

# I will craft the Stone Furnace now.

crafted_furnace_amount = craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Craft one Stone Furnace
assert crafted_furnace_amount == 1, "Failed to craft one Stone Furnace due to insufficient materials or inventory space."

# Verify the inventory again to check for the newly crafted furnace.
print(f"Inventory after crafting furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")
